about_the_game:
Introducing Round My Corners: Elevate Your Desktop Experience


Step into the future of desktop aesthetics with Round My Corners, a revolutionary software designed to give your screen a sleek and modern makeover. Join the "Round Corner Cult" and say farewell to sharp edges as you embrace smooth, rounded corners that will transform your desktop into a visual masterpiece.

Features:


  • Effortless Integration: Seamlessly sets up on your desktop, creating a window for each monitor and providing easy access through the system tray menu.

  • Tailored Customization: Adjust the size, color, and style of your rounded corners with intuitive sliders and customizable options. Whether you prefer a minimalist look or a bold design, Round My Corners has you covered.

  • Low CPU and RAM Usage: Enjoy a smooth user experience without worrying about excessive resource consumption. Round My Corners is optimized for minimal impact on system performance.

  • Enhanced Performance: Enjoy uninterrupted usage, even during full-screen (* Some games only support Windowed Borderless Mode) gaming sessions or while running other live wallpaper programs. Round My Corners ensures a seamless experience without compromising performance.

  • Auto-Start Functionality: Set Round My Corners to launch automatically at startup, ensuring your rounded corner experience is always ready when you are.

  • TranslucentTB Support: Enhance your desktop further with support for TranslucentTB, a lightweight utility that makes the Windows taskbar translucent/transparent on Windows 10 and Windows 11.

  • Multi-Monitor Support: Adapt Round My Corners to multiple monitors, ensuring a consistent rounded corner experience across all your displays.

  • Save and Convert: Save your preferences effortlessly and convert your straight-angled screens into a Macbook-like rounded corner paradise.

Elevate your desktop experience today with Round My Corners. Join the Round Corner Cult and say goodbye to sharp edges, embracing a world of smooth, rounded perfection.

highlighted.name: See u in the next boot o7

name: Round My Corners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Version 1909
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 HT 631
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce FX 5000 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A working buzzer
  • Additional Notes: As long as you can run a browser ¯\(ツ)/¯
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 9000 512 Bits Galactic Edition
  • Processor: Intel® Ryzen™ RTX 9 processor 14900KSXTX3DE D Ti Special Black Limited Edition GRE Super 36MB
  • Memory: 9999999 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU for Matrix Simulation with at least ∞ Point in 3DMark Timespy
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9999999 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Arduino Speaker
  • Additional Notes: Post "Go get a 4060" on r/PCMasterRace

short_description: Round My Corners transforms your desktop with smooth, rounded edges, seamlessly integrated for a sleek look. Customize effortlessly, enjoy low resource consumption, and elevate your digital experience. Join the Round Corner Cult and embrace the future of desktop aesthetics today!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
